title: league crashing during loading screen
body: this has happened 3 days in 1 week game just freezes when the game loads any help?

replies.body: What do you mean exactly when you crashing/freezing?  Does the game close down?  Are you staring at a black screen?  Do you receive any error messages?  Let me know!
should i reinstall league? people say that sometimes works

The additional information you provided doesn't give a lot of details, but we can still take a few steps to try and fix this up.  As a first step, issues like this can be caused by third party programs that interact with league.  Meaning, remove any apps like play.tv or overwolf.

As a second step, if you recently updated Windows 10, some players have had this freezing as a result of the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) .  Disabling that could do the trick.

Let me know if that helps!
